title: Parsing Practice
goal: Learn to parse complex multi-level sentences.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Conversion review:

lo nu se ctuca cu nandu = ?

(Answer: Being taught is difficult)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
vajni x1 is important to x2 important
nandu x1 is difficult for x2 difficult

Parsing Strategy

  1. Find the main selbri (after cu or at start)
  2. Identify abstraction boundaries (lo nu, lo du'u)
  3. Note conversions and their scope
  4. Trace relative clauses back to ke'a

Example Parse

mi jinvi lo du'u lo nu tadni la .jbobau. cu vajni

Step 1: Main bridi = mi jinvi X Step 2: X = lo du'u Y Step 3: Y = lo nu tadni la .jbobau. cu vajni Step 4: Inner = tadni la .jbobau. (study Lojban) is important

Full meaning: I think that studying Lojban is important.

Complex Example

mi djuno lo du'u la .alis. cu djica lo nu mi ctuca ri

Parse:

  • mi djuno lo du'u [Alice wants [me to teach her]]
  • Level 1: mi djuno
  • Level 2: la .alis. djica
  • Level 3: mi ctuca ri

Full meaning: I know that Alice wants me to teach her.

Key Point

Parse from outside in. Identify each abstraction layer separately.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Parse These

Break down the structure:

  1. mi krici lo du'u do gleki
Answer
  • Main: mi krici (I believe)
  • Inner: do gleki (you are happy)
  • Meaning: I believe that you are happy.
  1. la .bob. cu jinvi lo du'u mi djica lo nu klama
Answer
  • Level 1: la .bob. jinvi (Bob thinks)
  • Level 2: mi djica (I want)
  • Level 3: klama (to go)
  • Meaning: Bob thinks that I want to go.

Exercise 2: Translate Complex Sentences

Translate:

  1. I know that learning is important.
  2. Alice thinks that teaching Bob is difficult.
  3. I believe that you know that science is good.
Answers
  1. mi djuno lo du'u lo nu cilre cu vajni
  2. la .alis. cu jinvi lo du'u lo nu ctuca la .bob. cu nandu
  3. mi krici lo du'u do djuno lo du'u lo saske cu xamgu

Exercise 3: Build Complex Sentences

Create sentences with 3 levels:

  1. [You think [I want [to study]]]
  2. [I know [Alice believes [it's important]]]
Answers
  1. do jinvi lo du'u mi djica lo nu tadni
  2. mi djuno lo du'u la .alis. cu krici lo du'u ri vajni

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Parse and say aloud:

mi jinvi lo du'u lo nu cilre la .jbobau. cu vajni je nandu
Answer

I think that learning Lojban is important and difficult.

Summary

You practiced parsing complex sentences by identifying abstraction layers. Read from outside in.
